GameState

Class GameOver

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameState.GameState
      • GameState.GameOver

  • public class GameOver
extends GameState
    Creates a Game Over screen when the character dies. Displays the score of the last game that was played and gives options for the user to retry, return to main menu, or quit.
    Version:
    May 22, 2017
    Author:
    Ritik Batra and Johnson Ku, Period: 2, Assignment: JavaRun, Sources: none

      Sets the background picture and creates the different fonts.
